body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Elijah Garcia and the customer's name is Virginia Young.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Elijah Garcia, and I'm with Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, I'm Virginia Young. I'm having a bit of a tough time deciding on a motorcycle.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Virginia. Choosing the right motorcycle can be quite overwhelming. May I ask what specific features or styles you are most interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm looking for something comfortable for long rides but also stylish.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That sounds great! We have several models that would fit that description. Before we dive deeper, could you please provide me with your phone number, just in case we get disconnected?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's two zero three, five six seven, eight nine zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! I appreciate that. If you don't mind, could you also share your zip code so I can find the nearest dealership for you?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's one zero one zero two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect! Thank you, Virginia. I will use that information to help you find the best options nearby. Can you tell me if you have any previous riding experience?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I've ridden a bit, but I'm still a novice.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: No worries! We have excellent beginner-friendly models as well. Thank you for your time, Virginia. If you have further questions, feel free to reach out anytime. Have a great day!
